description: Welcome to an oversized 3 bed 3 bath END unit townhouse in Riverwood with a DOUBLE CAR GARAGE, huge fully fenced backyard with GAZEBO. Sprawling 1,760+ sf on 2-levels, enjoy spacious kitchen with SS appliances & dining area with cozy gas fireplace to separate from the living room offering PLENTY of natural light. Plenty of room for the whole family with LARGE bedrooms upstairs & 2 bathrooms, a dedicated laundry room with newer W/D. Massive primary bedroom with views of the mountains & full ensuite. Walking distance to shopping & all levels of schools including Terry Fox Secondary and Blackburn Elementary. OPEN HOUSE Saturday, Jan 10 from 12 - 3 PM
